sense.gloss: equinoctial week (when Buddhist services are held)
Buddhist services during the equinoctial week

sdata.j: ↑暑↑↓あつ↓さ↑寒↑↓さむ↓さも↑彼岸↑↓|ひがん|↓まで。
sdata.e: No heat or cold lasts beyond the equinox.

sdata.j: ↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓シンクロ↑界↑↓かい↓の↑悲願↑↓|ひがん|↓である↑金↑↓きん↓には、あと↑一歩↑↓いっぽ↓で↑届↑↓とど↓かなかった。
sdata.e: The 'gold' yearned for by the Japanese synchronized swimming world was not quite reached.
